TopicTitle: [rocket builder] SpaceK Rockets and general sillyness

Articles.Content:
Here's where I will post my silliest and working and silly and working rocket designs.

How it works: most are stock rockets; it makes it more funny if you can do it with the limited number of pieces stock provides. If there are mods, it will usually be just one or two; no need to over-complicate things.

Space Truck [MOD]

Get out your old rock and roll LP's because it's time to go space trucking! This truck is a fairly good refueling station with ten docking ports for low to mid-Kerbal-orbit. Because of the asymmetric design, the truck itself pulls up ever so slightly while under power and may need RCS for full-throttle burns. Provided with the space truck is two versions: Space Truck Without Rocket and Space Truck With Rocket. Fairly self explanatory, but for people who need to know, Space Truck Without Rocket is a VAB save that only includes the truck, and the Space Truck With Rocket includes the lifter that I used to get the truck into space.

MODS USED

  • TT's Modular Multiwheels

get the Space Truck here

more craft and silliness soon
